content.rendered:
Directed by Pawan Kumar.

Written by Pawan Kumar. Pradeep RishiRaj. Gautam Siddharth.

Cast Samantha Ruth Prabhu(Rachana (as Samantha Akkineni)). Aadhi(Nayak (as Aadhi Pinisetty)). Bhoomika Chawla(Maaya (as Bhumika Chawla)). Rahul Ravindran(Aditya). Narain(Ritesh). Aadukalam Naren(Chandrasekar). Ravi Prakash(Prabhakar). Hari Teja(Akhila (as Hariteja)). Siddhiksha(Arna (as Baby Siddhiksha)). Chatrapathi Sekhar(Sharath Kumar Advocate (as Chandra Sekhar)). Rajshri Nair((as Rajashri Nair)). Nagabhushana(Auto Rickshaw Driver). Ranganayaka((as Ranga Nayaka)).Chethan Dsouza.Delson D’Souza. Birla Bose(Sunder).Narendra Naidu.Kiran.Joga Rao.Swati. Venkat Rao((as Venkat Rao RTA)).Ramani. Shashanka Narayana((as Shashank Narayana\ZA)).Pawan Kumar.Ramesh Kumar.Divya. Bhagya Shree((as Bhagya Sree)).Master Snehith.Veerabhadram . Satya Krishnan(Anu’s Mother). Sapthagiri(Janaganamana Jagadish). Tulasi(Kalyan’s Mother). Kiran Naik(Cop (uncredited))

Languages Telugu. Tamil.

Producers Rambabu Bandaru. Srinivasaa Chitturi.

Production Goldmines Telefilms. Pawan Kumar Studios. Srinivasaa Silver Screen.
